author: Allie
text: .@discord your support system is ridiculous, or better yet non-existent. No one answers tickets, I've been locked out of my account for months and nobody is replying to emails. This behaviour is absurd.

author: Allie
text: .@discord so what is it about my account that makes me unable to log in and your support system able to ignore my many emails asking for help? I've had a problem since April OF LAST YEAR and no one can allow me access back to my account. Any idea?
